verses.verse: The beginning <S%G746><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

Even as <S%G5613><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Isaiah the prophet <S%G2400><s%>, Behold, I <S%G1473><s%> send <S%G649><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> messenger <S%G32><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> face <S%G4383><s%>, Who shall prepare <S%G2680><s%> thy4675, 3598, 4675 way <S%G4675><s%>.

The voice <S%G5456><s%> of one crying <S%G994><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>, Make ye <S%G2090><s%> ready the way <S%G3598><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, Make <S%G4160><s%> his <S%G846><s%> paths <S%G5147><s%> straight <S%G2117><s%>;

John <S%G2491><s%> came <S%G1096><s%>, who baptized <S%G907><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> preached <S%G2784><s%> the baptism <S%G908><s%> of repentance <S%G3341><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> remission <S%G859><s%> of sins <S%G266><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there went out <S%G1607><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the country <S%G5561><s%> of Judaea <S%G2532><s%>, and all <S%G3956><s%> they of <S%G5259><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2415><s%>; And <S%G2532><s%> they were <S%G907><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the river <S%G4215><s%> Jordan <S%G2446><s%>, confessing <S%G1843><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> clothed with <S%G1746><s%> camel <S%G2574><s%>'s hair <S%G2359><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> had a leathern <S%G1193><s%> girdle <S%G2223><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> loins <S%G3751><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> did eat <S%G2068><s%> locusts <S%G200><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wild <S%G66><s%> honey <S%G3192><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he preached <S%G2784><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, There cometh <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> he that is mightier than <S%G2478><s%> I <S%G3450><s%>, the latchet <S%G2438><s%> of whose <S%G3739><s%> shoes <S%G5266><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G2425><s%> to <S%G3089><s%> stoop down <S%G2955><s%> and unloose <S%G3089><s%>.

I1473, Ezekiel3 baptized <S%G907><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1473><s%> water <S%G5204><s%>; But <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> shall baptize <S%G907><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>, that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Nazareth <S%G3478><s%> of Galilee <S%G1056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> was baptized <S%G907><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the Jordan <S%G2446><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> coming up <S%G305><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%>, he saw <S%G1492><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%> rent <S%G4977><s%> asunder <S%G2532><s%>, and the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> as <S%G5616><s%> a dove <S%G4058><s%> descending <S%G2597><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%>, Thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> thee <S%G3739><s%> I am well pleased <S%G2106><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2117><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> driveth <S%G1544><s%> him <S%G846><s%> forth into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he was2258, 1563 in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> tempted <S%G3985><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%>; And <S%G2532><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the wild beasts <S%G2342><s%>; And <S%G2532><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> ministered <S%G1247><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> was delivered up <S%G3860><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%>, preaching <S%G2784><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of <S%G932><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%>, The time <S%G2540><s%> is fulfilled <S%G4137><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is at hand <S%G1448><s%>: repent ye <S%G3340><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> in the gospel <S%G1722><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> passing <S%G4043><s%> along by <S%G3844><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee <S%G1056><s%>, he saw <S%G1492><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%> the <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> of Simon casting <S%G906><s%> a net <S%G293><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> fishers <S%G231><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Come ye <S%G1205><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I will make <S%G4160><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> to become <S%G1096><s%> fishers <S%G231><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> they left <S%G863><s%> the <S%G846><s%> nets <S%G1350><s%>, and followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> going <S%G4260><s%> on <S%G1564><s%> a little further <S%G3641><s%>, he saw <S%G1492><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> the son of Zebedee <S%G2199><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>, who <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> were <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> mending <S%G2675><s%> the nets <S%G1350><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> he called <S%G2564><s%> them <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they left <S%G863><s%> their <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> Zebedee <S%G2199><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the hired servants <S%G3411><s%>, and went <S%G565><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they go <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum <S%G2584><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> on the sabbath day <S%G4521><s%> he entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> and taught <S%G1321><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they were astonished <S%G1605><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> teaching <S%G1322><s%>: For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G2258><s%> taught1321, 2258 them <S%G846><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> straightway there was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> synagogue <S%G4864><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> an unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he cried out <S%G349><s%>,

saying <S%G3004><s%>, <S%G1436><s%> What have <S%G5101><s%> we to do <S%G2254><s%> with <S%G2532><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> thou Nazarene <S%G3479><s%>? art thou come <S%G2064><s%> to destroy <S%G622><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>? I know <S%G1492><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> thou art <S%G1488><s%>, the Holy One <S%G40><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Hold thy peace <S%G5392><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> come out <S%G1831><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G4682><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>, tearing <S%G4682><s%> him <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> crying <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, came out <S%G1831><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they were <S%G2284><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> amazed <S%G2284><s%>, insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> they questioned <S%G4802><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>? a <S%G5101><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> teaching <S%G1322><s%>! 3778, 3754 with <S%G2596><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> he commandeth <S%G2004><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they obey <S%G5219><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the report <S%G189><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> straightway <S%G2117><s%> everywhere <S%G1519><s%> into all <S%G3650><s%> the region of Galilee <S%G1056><s%> round about <S%G4066><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%>, when they were come out <S%G1831><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%>, they came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> of Simon <S%G4613><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%>, with <S%G3326><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%>'s wife <S%G3994><s%>'s mother lay <S%G2621><s%> sick of a fever <S%G4445><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> they tell <S%G3004><s%> him <S%G846><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> her <S%G846><s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G4334><s%> and took <S%G2902><s%> her <S%G846><s%> by the hand <S%G5495><s%>, and raised <S%G1453><s%> her <S%G846><s%> up <S%G1453><s%>; and2532, 2112 the fever <S%G4446><s%> left <S%G863><s%> her <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> she ministered <S%G1247><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> at even <S%G3798><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> did <S%G1096><s%> set <S%G1416><s%>, they brought <S%G5342><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that were <S%G2192><s%> sick <S%G2560><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> that were possessed with demons <S%G1139><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> gathered together <S%G1996><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he healed <S%G2323><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> that were <S%G2192><s%> sick <S%G2560><s%> with divers <S%G4164><s%> diseases <S%G3554><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> cast out <S%G1544><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> demons <S%G1140><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he suffered <S%G863><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the demons <S%G1140><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> they knew <S%G1492><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> in the morning <S%G4404><s%>, a great while <S%G3029><s%> before day <S%G1773><s%>, he rose up <S%G450><s%> and went out <S%G1831><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> departed <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a desert <S%G2048><s%> place <S%G5117><s%>, and there <S%G2546><s%> prayed <S%G4336><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they that were <S%G3588><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%> followed after <S%G2614><s%> him <S%G846><s%>;
and <S%G2532><s%> they found <S%G2147><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and say <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, All <S%G3956><s%> are seeking <S%G2212><s%> thee <S%G3754><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Let us go <S%G71><s%> elsewhere into <S%G1519><s%> the next <S%G2192><s%> towns <S%G2969><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I may preach <S%G2784><s%> there also <S%G2546><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> to this end <S%G5124><s%> came I forth <S%G1831><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2258><s%> went into <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> synagogues <S%G4864><s%> throughout <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%>, preaching <S%G2784><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> casting out <S%G1544><s%> demons <S%G1140><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there cometh <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a leper <S%G3015><s%>, beseeching <S%G3870><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> kneeling down <S%G1120><s%> to him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, If <S%G1437><s%> thou wilt <S%G2309><s%>, thou canst make <S%G1410><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> clean <S%G3754><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> being moved with compassion <S%G4697><s%>, he stretched forth <S%G1614><s%> his hand <S%G5495><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> touched <S%G680><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, I will <S%G2309><s%>; be thou made clean <S%G2511><s%>.
And2532, 846, Exodus36 straightway <S%G2112><s%> the leprosy <S%G3014><s%> departed <S%G565><s%> from <S%G575><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he was made clean <S%G2511><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> he strictly charged <S%G1690><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G1690><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> sent <S%G1544><s%> him <S%G846><s%> out <S%G1544><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, See <S%G3708><s%> thou say <S%G2036><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> to any man <S%G3367><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> show <S%G1166><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> to the priest <S%G2409><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> offer <S%G4374><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> cleansing <S%G2512><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> commanded <S%G4367><s%>, for <S%G1519><s%> a testimony <S%G3142><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he went out <S%G1831><s%>, and began <S%G756><s%> to publish <S%G2784><s%> it much <S%G4183><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to spread abroad <S%G1310><s%> the matter <S%G3056><s%>, insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> Jesus <S%G846><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> no more <S%G3371><s%> openly <S%G5320><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a city <S%G4172><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> without <S%G1854><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> desert <S%G2048><s%> places <S%G5117><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> from every quarter <S%G3836><s%>.
